mapper.insert: INSERT into course_file (path, pay_coin, course_id, record_time, teacher_id) VALUES (#{path}, #{payCoin}, #{courseId}, #{recordTime}, #{teacherId})
mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.path, (SELECT name FROM course WHERE id = v.course_id) AS courseName, v.pay_coin, v.record_time FROM course_file AS v
SELECT pay_coin FROM course_video WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT cf.path, t.name AS teacherName, cs.name AS courseName, cf.pay_coin, c.name AS collegeName, cf.record_time FROM course_file AS cf JOIN teacher AS t on cf.teacher_id=t.id JOIN college AS c ON t.college_id = c.id JOIN course AS cs ON cs.id=cf.course_id
